resultObeseText:
Body Mass Index
>= 30

Much higher than normal body weight.
You should exercise more!
resultOverweightText:
Body Mass Index
>= 25 and <= 29.9

Higher than normal body weight.
Try to exercise more.
resultNormalText:
Body Mass Index
>= 18.5 and <= 24.9

Great, you have normal body weight.
Keep it like that ;)
resultUnderweightText:
Body Mass Index
<= 18.5

Lower than normal body weight.
You can eat a bit more :)
